title: Bitcoin Braces For A Surprise $22 Trillion Fed Price Earthquake
description: The U.S. M2 money supply has hit a record $22 trillion—named by analysts as a potential catalyst for a bitcoin price breakout...
content:
Bitcoin and crypto prices have traded sideways since Mayeven as U.S. president Donald Trumps crypto czar predicts a big Julyafter it surged through the first few months of Trumps second presidency.
